price: Basi usiwafanyie haraka. Sisi tunawahisabia idadi ya siku zao.
arabic: فَلَا تَعۡجَلۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ إِنَّمَا نَعُدُّ لَهُمۡ عَدّٗا

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: falā taʿjal ʿalayhim innamā naʿuddu lahum ʿaddan
